body:
> which is however fairly common if you use softmax and train to convergence. 

This is not common at all. For precisely numerical stability issues, one uses log + sum + exp formulations like log_softmax + NLLLoss or bce_loss_with_logits, or calling [log_sum_exp](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/2591#issuecomment-338980717).

This numerical issue is less about index_select's gradient and more about the intermediate ops being numerically unstable for the gradient.

@mys007 let me know if you disagree.
